alert.note: Alert for Northwest Pinal County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 19 at 1:32PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Pinal County through 215 PM MST... At 132 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles east of Florence to near Picacho. Movement was northwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Casa Grande, Florence, Coolidge, La Palma, Toltec, Arizola, Randolph, Coolidge Airport and Valley Farms. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 195 and 204. AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 175 and 178. AZ Route 87 between mile markers 124 and 137. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
